snippet: Daniel S. Loeb, the head of Third Point, has told Yahoo that he will officially start a proxy battle within the week, according to a letter obtained by The New York Times.
abstract: Daniel S. Loeb, the head of Third Point, has told Yahoo that he will officially start a proxy battle within the week, according to a letter obtained by The New York Times.

headline.main: Third Point's Loeb Warns Yahoo Chief of Looming Proxy Fight
